Support

Get help with implementation, report bugs, or request new features.

Support & Help

Welcome to the Enterprise Design System support section. Here you'll find resources to help you implement the design system, get answers to your questions, and connect with our team.

Frequently Asked Questions

Get quick answers to common questions about the Enterprise Design System.

How do I get started with the Enterprise Design System?

The best way to get started is to:

  1. Review the Design System Overview to understand the core principles and guidelines.
  2. Explore the Foundations to learn about our fundamental design elements.
  3. Browse the Component Library to see what components are available.
  4. Check out the Downloads section to access design files and code libraries.
How can I contribute to the design system?

We welcome contributions from the community! To contribute:

  1. Review our Contribution Guidelines.
  2. Create a proposal using our Contribution Template.
  3. Submit your proposal to the design system team for review.

For more details, visit our Contribution page.

What if I need a component that doesn't exist in the library?

If you need a component that's not currently in our library:

  1. Check if a similar component can be adapted for your needs.
  2. Submit a Feature Request with details about the component you need.
  3. Consider creating a custom component that follows our design guidelines until an official one is available.
How do I report a bug or issue?

To report a bug or issue with a component:

  1. Go to the Report a Bug page.
  2. Fill out the bug report form with as much detail as possible, including browser/device information, steps to reproduce, and screenshots if available.
  3. Submit the form, and our team will review and respond to your report.
How often is the design system updated?

The Enterprise Design System follows a regular release schedule:

  • Major releases: 2-3 times per year (may include breaking changes)
  • Minor releases: Monthly (new features, no breaking changes)
  • Patch releases: As needed (bug fixes and small improvements)

You can view our Roadmap to see upcoming changes and follow our Release Notes for details about each update.

Get help with implementing the Enterprise Design System through our various support channels.

Community Forum

Connect with other designers and developers to ask questions, share solutions, and discuss best practices.

Visit Forum →

Email Support

Contact our support team directly for help with implementation issues or questions about the design system.

Contact Support →

GitHub

Submit bug reports, feature requests, and contribute to the design system code repository.

View Repository →

Office Hours

Virtual sessions with our design system team to get your questions answered and receive guidance on implementation.

Schedule Session →

Find detailed documentation and guides to help you implement the Enterprise Design System.

Technical documentation for developers on how to use and extend the design system.

Designer Guide

Guidelines for designers on how to use design files and maintain consistency.

Tutorials

Step-by-step tutorials for common implementation scenarios.

Details about each release, including new features, improvements, and bug fixes.
